content: The shade matched my complexion almost perfectly! The product has great coverage and a nice smell. The only complaint I have. Is that the pump broke within 5 days of purchasing.
Looks like I have nothing on!! It’s a nice coverage and looks good all day long! Definitely recommend
Really good foundation I like it a lot but sometimes it grabs to dry patches and kinda looks weird but overall a really good foundation you just have to moisturize a lot if you have dry skin

I normally have combination skin, but this year has been extremely dry. So, I moisturize! Then I tried this foundation and my face did not respind well. The foundation felt as if it was running off and became very glossy. Not the natural look I was going for. Unfortunately, it also picked up on any facial flaw (pores, dry skin, wrinkles), most you can't normally see, unless I use this foundation.
This is honestly the best foundation I have ever bought! I love it, it's so natural and perfect for my sensitive skin
title: Fentyyyyyyyyyyy
grabs to dry patches
Not for the Non-Flawless
It's amazing
Great For Fair Skin!

name: Pro Filt'r Soft Matte Longwear Foundation
